title: Translate to English
instruction: Translate these classical Tibetan sentences into English, identifying the Subject-Object-Verb structure.

questions.transliteration: byang chub sems dpas sems can la phan pa btang
questions.correctAnswer: The bodhisattva gave benefit to sentient beings.
The Victorious One spoke the truth.

correctFeedback: Excellent work! Your translation correctly identifies the SOV structure.
incorrectFeedback: Review the SOV structure. Remember: Subject + Object + Verb.
